scriptDesc.scriptNote: Sephardi semi-cursive script of the 16th to 17th century.

history.provenance: Acquisition: Moses Wilhelm Shapira (b. 1830, d. 1884), an antiquities dealer of Jerusalem: purchased by the British Museum from him on 08 July 1882: inscribed, folio [120v].
